about_the_game:
A beautiful open world is waiting for you! Learn different fighting styles and magic skills, practice archery. Explore the world, mine resources, create weapons and brew potions, combine combat sets. Fight for justice and restore the Hoku Shrine!

Currently implemented in the game:

  • Character progression
  • Melee Combat (Two-handed Axe, Two-handed Sword, Sword and Shield, Halberd)
  • Ranged Combat with Bow and Arrow
  • Magic Spells
  • Enhancement with magic and potions
  • Resource Gathering: wood, herbs, crystals and minerals.
  • Armor and weapon crafting, potion brewing
  • Locations full of mobs, dungeons with guards and bosses.
